block.p: ''Colombia is the heart of the drug war and we'd better get on with it. If we lose in Colombia, then we lose everywhere.''
SENATOR PAUL COVERDELL, Republican of Georgia, supporting an anti-drug aid plan for Colombia. [A1]
''The capacity of this body for self-delusion appears to this senator to be unlimited. There has been no consideration of the consequences, cost and length of involvement.''
SENATOR SLADE GORTON, a Washington State Republican, opposing it. [A1]
